ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Essence of Dol, Batons, yatta yatta
ygData.msgSnippet: Doh!  Don t know how I missed that . . Oh well . . . guess I have to wait till I m higher, and can bring a few buddies.  I hate quests that you have to
ygData.messageBody:
Doh! Don't know how I missed that . . Oh well . . . guess I have to wait till
I'm higher, and can bring a few buddies. I hate quests that you have to
mobilize a group for, and the common spawns don't drop much.

On Tue, Aug 29, 2000 at 10:01:40AM +1000, Sean O'Brien wrote:
> ahh no.
> Patriach drops azure sleeves (ebony blade rare)
> Elder drops cryosbyl talisman and some mask.
>
> And on Tarew Marr they are not camped that regularly.
>
> David Frascone wrote:
> >
> > I'm assuming that since the elder drops the azure sleves that he's perma-camped.
> > Am I pretty safe in assuming that?
> >
> > On Tue, Aug 29, 2000 at 09:55:00AM +1000, Sean O'Brien wrote:
> > > David Frascone wrote:
> > > >
> > > > Is everyone dead? I finally got the essence of Dol and baton. I had to save
> > > > up 3kp to get it. (Luckily, my wife quit eq, so I got to sell all of her stuff,
> > > > and managed to get 4.2kp out of it)
> > > >
> > > > So, I'm hanging out in Dalnir, praying that I manage to get some crescent armor.
> > > >
> > > > But, I've started jonesing for quests again. What level do I have to be to
> > > > start trying to get the Robe of the Lost circle? I'd prefer to go with a small
> > > > group of a bit higher than me (say a group of 3 35s-40s), or a full group of
> > > > low 30s.
> > > Well you should have the sash and headband already if not get em
> > > already.
> > >
> > > >
> > > > Any chance in hell I can camp the spawns at that level?
> > >
> > > The rock in solB is in the king room. It takes a full group of 6 35's to
> > > camp that room (and even then the king will most likely wipe you out).
> > > Or just a few of 45's. The raster area is much more campable at that
> > > level but still all the mobs are 35 (cept for the elder not sure on its
> > > level).
> > >
> > >
> > >
> >
>
>
>
